name: Multiplayer Test - COF
description:
THIS GAME SUCKS AAAAAA.

multiplayer shooter game and it is online but it is sucks.

donate me some robux :D https://www.roblox.com/games/3922676843/Line-Runner-Classic#!/store

Controls:

WASD to move

Mouse 1 to shoot

Mouse 2 to aim

Scroll wheel to switch weapons

O to open the pause menu

P to leave a server

brackets to change the crosshair size

hold left shift to run

How to make a server:

1. Click on the create input field

2. Type a name for the server

3. Click create server with the map you want (theres only 1 map right now)

4. To join a server you must type the server name into the join input field and click the join button (if you forgot the server name just open the pause menu to see the server info)

Game Stuffs:

uhh... shootin people gives you points

takin damage and dyin costs you points

that's it

Update Stuffs can be found in the readme file in the zip
